name: Becky Walker
text: Excellent group to work with if you need professional sound at a great price.  They have worked several  programs for the past four years and never cease to amaze me.  Neat, professional, punctual and cooperative...they do what YOU want for your program.

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! We love doing your program each year and we thank you for the great review!

name: Kelly Pate
text: Excellent DJ service, Dependable, Up to date on all music etc.!!! Excellent Company to plan your Special Event With!! You will not regret Booking These Guys!!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly for the great review!!

name: Daniel Watts
text:
After watching Alex and his crew work wonders at a wedding (DJ'ing, photography, and even DRONE videography), my company decided to purchase a DJI Phantom 4 through his company.  We got a really great deal on the drone and accessories, and Alex even recommended some items, such as blade guards, that I would have never thought of (at least not until after I replaced the blades a dozen times).

Alex and his group are prompt, professional, and I will gladly recommend them to anyone considering...well ANYTHING related to needing a DJ, photographers, videographers, etc.  Great company!
